root:
^Day 16
The project has been going swimmingly! The specimen has been showing tremendous signs of intelligence! Why, just yesterday, Bob #17 got close to its cage and it reacted by tearing his head off! This suggests a high level of aggression only found in intelligent life! Bob #27 has been experimenting by poking it repeatedly with a stick for the past 6 hours. We should be perfectly safe just as long as it doesn't escape!
